boys.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a group of men who do the same job
boys.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Oh no! Wait until the press boys get hold of this story.
boys.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: men in the army, navy etc, especially those who are fighting in a war
boys.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: our boys on the front lines
